title: Minecraft 基岩版 Beta 1.16.20.50 发布
author: zyjking
txt_content:
本帖最后由 zyjking 于 2020-6-26 22:06 编辑 

测试版是Minecraft基岩版的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。
然而，测试版主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。适用于正式版的领域服务器与测试版不兼容。
如果在测试版中遇到旧版存档无法使用的问题，测试版将允许你将存档上传以供开发团队查找问题。
Minecraft基岩版 1.16.20 仍未发布，1.16.20.50为其第1个测试版。
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。

https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360045006632

New Features
新特性

Piglin Brute
Piglin Brutes are stronger versions of Piglins that live in bastion remnants and protect the treasures there比普通猪灵更强大，守护着堡垒遗迹中的宝藏Unlike their cowardly and greedy counterparts, the Piglin Brutes cannot be distracted by gold and aren't afraid of anything相比胆小而贪婪的同类，她们不会被金子吸引，也不惧怕任何事情Piglin Brutes attack players on sight, no matter how the player is dressed无论是否穿着金套，都会攻击玩家Piglin Brutes wield axes and don't need any armor, because they're just that tough!无需穿任何盔甲，并挥舞着斧头，因为她们就是硬气！

Fixes
bug修复
修复了45个bugBaby pigs now despawn properly幼年猪会遵循反生成规则了Dolphins, fish, and squid now spawn in bubble columns again MCPE-73967海豚，鱼和鱿鱼会在气泡柱里生成了Mobs max spawn radius is now 44 blocks MCPE-79359生物的最大生成范围半径调整为44格Walls now connect to open trapdoors MCPE-79490墙体会正常连接打开的陷阱门了Walls now connect to glass blocks MCPE-79483墙体会正确连接玻璃方块了Breaking a Furnace will now drop the stored experience from smelting MCPE-71651破坏熔炉或掉落存储在其中的经验了Stem blocks now break again when the block below them is destroyed MCPE-79577南瓜或西瓜藤下面的土被破坏时会正常被破坏了Using Bonemeal on flowers or grass blocks no longer consumes the item if nothing can grow MCPE-73889如果对花或草方块使用骨粉，但什么也没发生的话，骨粉不会被消耗了Wither health bar no longer depletes to zero after half of the health is gone MCPE-79661凋灵的生命值被消耗一半时不会再被清零了Boats are no longer slowed down by objects with no collision MCPE-81316无碰撞时，船不会再减速了Ambience cave sounds are no longer played in marketplace content洞穴环境音效不会再市场内容上播放了Slime blocks pushed by pistons launch players correctly again MCPE-62419活塞推动史莱姆方块时会正常发射玩家了Soul Campfires now emits correct light level MCPE-73890灵魂营火会发出正确的亮度等级了Climbing vines now emits sounds MCPE-69741攀爬藤蔓会发出声音了Corrected sound for Nether Wart placement修复了种植下界疣的音效Placing or stepping on Warped or Crimson processed materials or planks now make wood sound MCPE-69029在诡异或绯红模板及其材料上放置或行走会发出木头音效了Hoglins no longer attack on peaceful mode when too close MCPE-71939和平模式下靠疣猪兽靠得太近不会再法器攻击了Piglins can no longer naturally spawn on Shroomlight菌光体上不会再自然生成猪灵了Tamed wolves no longer disappear when returning to overworld through a Nether portal通过下界传送门返回主世界时，被驯服的狼不会再消失了Piglins now spawn on peaceful difficulty和平模式下会生成猪灵了Netherite items no longer bounce on lava MCPE-65372下界合金锭不会再熔岩上弹跳了Netherite armor now have a unique sound when equipped MCPE-69047下界合金盔甲在装备时会发出独特音效了Zoglins now have sounds distinct from pigs MCPE-73220将僵尸疣猪兽的音效与猪区分开Speed of credits roll is no longer dependant on frameratecredits roll的速度不再取决于帧率范围了Using locate command to find a Ruined Portal will no longer return a placeholder text MCPE-79323用/locate指令寻找废弃传送门时不会再反馈占位符文本了Hyphae blocks now take as long as stem blocks to destroy MCPE-72045菌核方块的破坏时长改为和菌柄一样了New Nether biomes, blocks and structures no longer generates into worlds with a fixed version MCPE-66357固定版本的存档将不会生成新的下界群系，方块和结构The tooltip 'Open' is no longer shown when looking at Piglins MCPE-79376看向猪灵时不会显示“打开”的悬浮文本了Piglins arms are now behaving more like the players arms, and less like the zombies arms MCPE-74089猪灵的手臂更像玩家的了，而不是僵尸的Piglin killed with a single blow while admiring Gold Ingot now drops admired the Gold Ingot在猪灵端详金锭时将其一击杀死后会掉落正在端详的金锭Fixed issues around duplicating items, when reloading a world while Piglin is admiring an item修复了猪灵正在端详物品并重新加载存档时会复制物品的问题Netherite items in lava no longer disappear when reloading world MCPE-70774重新加载存档不会再丢失熔岩中的下界合金锭了Updated Piglin geometry and entity files, fixed issue with scaling carried item for baby humanoid mobs更新猪灵的模型与实体文件，修复了幼年人性生物缩放携带的物品的问题Quartz Block can no longer be created from Chiseled Quartz Block and Pillar Quartz Block in a Furnace不能再使用熔炉将錾制石英块和石英柱烧炼成石英块了Quartz Bricks can no longer be crafted from anything but Quartz Blocks on the Stonecutter只能只用切石机将石英块变为石英砖了Target Block's zones for particular redstone signal strength are no longer misplaced because of old Arrow Geometry不会再因为旧的箭矢模型而影响标靶方块红石信号的强度了We no longer try to draw Netherite in the Beacon UI我们不会再信标UI上尝试使用下界合金锭了Setting Soul Sand on fire no longer produces a placeholder Soul Fire block on Pre Nether version locked content将灵魂沙放再火上不会再生成下界更新之前的占位符方块了Piglin no longer drops up to a full stack of Gold Ingots upon giving him one by right-clicking and reloading a world while he is admiring it, instead it drops something from its loot table猪灵在端详金锭时，用右键给她一个金锭，并重新加载存档不会再掉落一组金锭了，而是从抽取表中随机给予了Piglins no longer pick up entire stacks of Gold MCPE-76080猪灵不会一次拾取一叠金锭了Wither boss bar now reappears when returning from other dimension从其它维度返回会正常显示凋灵Boss的生命值了Piglin no longer spawn with enchanted gear猪灵生成不会再穿戴附魔装备了Husks now prefer Iron armour over Chain armour调整尸壳的铁盔甲优先级比锁链盔甲更高Player can no longer interact with Piglin babies玩家不能再与幼年猪灵互动了Fixed recipes when crafting a barrel from Warped or Crimson slab修复了用诡异或绯红台阶制作木桶的问题


相关地址谷歌正版https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mojang.minecraftpe基岩版测试组安卓Google Play：https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.mojang.minecraftpeWin10 Store：https://www.microsoft.com/zh-cn/store/p/xbox-insider-hub/9nblggh68vsk

外部来源以及详细的更新条目追踪
